EmailTemplate.name: Rejection Warning Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Rejection Letter for {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Type__c}{!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To {!License_Registration__c.Applicant__c}:
Your {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} application for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} has been rejected. This is either due to an incomplete application and/or your completed application, with the required information or items, was not resubmitted within the 60-day time frame.
Under CA Code of Regulations, Section 13635.1(b), you may submit a subsequent application, which must be accompanied by the required fees.
If you have any further questions, please contact our agency Mondays, Wednesdays, or Fridays, 8:00 am to 5:00 pm at (510) 285-3398. Or you can email us at DLSE.Licensing@dir.ca.gov
{!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c}
{!License_Registration__c.Registration_Site__c}
Thank you, Licensing and Registration Unit Division of Labor Standards Enforcement
